content: of moss to join them together so it s more of a patch weave in ends 1 2 3 4 5 6 using the end sew the corners of the hood near the arms as shown pic 6 sew the hood to the top of the head weave in end  optional book cover in brown chain 11 row 1 skip first chain single_crochet in each chain across 10 row 2-6 5 row chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across 10 working around the edges of the book chain 1 1 single_crochet on side of rectangle between row 4 and 5 single_crochet 4 more along side pic 1 chain 1 single_crochet 10 along bottom chain 1 single_crochet 5 times along other side chain  © mythic crochet and knit studios 2025 this pattern is for personal use only it is not to be resold redistributed reposted or translated you may sell finished items from this pattern but please do not use my pictures to promote them 5 1 single_crochet 10 on top slip_stitch in first chain you made in the round fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing pages in white or cream chain 11 row 1 skip first chain single_crochet in each chain across 10 row 2-6 5 row chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across 10 fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing sew the pages to the cover down the middle sew the bottom corners of the book to the bobble st arms pic 2 1 2  thank you i hope you enjoyed this patten if you notice a mistake in the pattern or have any questions please send me an email or post a comment on ravelry mythiccrochetknit@gmail com  © mythic crochet and knit studios 2025 this pattern is for personal use only it is not to be resold redistributed reposted or translated you may sell finished items from this pattern but please do not use my pictures to promote them
